content.question: Over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 5, a particle moves along the x-axis. The graph of the particle’s velocity, v, is shown above. Over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 5, the particle’s displacement is 3 and the particle travels a total distance of 13. topic.text: 8.2: Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration Functions Using Integrals

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
